name: LightCastle
description:
Are you Ready to Enter the Empty Castle to free the Souls Trapped at the Top?

Find the Exit Stairs in each Level. go up them and you'll ascend to the next level

Controls:

Shift or X (Xbox Controller) : Dash

Space or A : Jump

Many smaller bugs are still present and will likely not be patched in the near future. Nothing Game breaking hopefully, and there is a end once you ascent 6 times (which will be hard to achieve but good luck. if you manage to hit the end Screenshot the Stats window and @ me in the MiniJam Discord: @Adesi).

10% of Collected Souls will be kept between run making you stronger the next run.
